constituent: exchange, husband, sun, day, tongue wagging, husband2
koohiiStory1: A show like "Trading Spouses" called "exchanging husbands" where 2 husbands are exchanged for a day (thanks dingomick).
koohiiStory2: Marge´s dream: to exchange Homer for another husband for just one day.
myStory: thay đổi. hoán đổi. thay thế. ngày hai người chồng
readingExamples: 替える (か.える), 替わる (か.わる)
words:
替える(かえる): to exchange, to interchange, to substitute, to replace
切り替える(きりかえる): to change, to exchange, to convert, to renew, to throw a switch, to replace, to switch over
取り替え(とりかえ): swap, exchange
為替(かわせ): money order, exchange
着替え(きがえ): changing clothes, change of clothes
交替(こうたい): alternation, change, shift, relief, relay
両替(りょうがえ): change, money exchange
取り替える(とりかえる): exchange
